isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - ASSEMBLE - STANDARD SHIFTER HOUSING

svcproc.title: STANDARD SHIFTER HOUSING
svcproc.para: Apply Eaton sealant #71208 or Loctite 242 to the shift bar housing plugs which are used to plug oil cooler provision holes. The sealant should be applied so that at least 5 complete threads are covered.

Apply Eaton lockwire #1819 or equivalent to all shifter housing assembly set screws in both blocks and yokes. The wire should anchor the setscrew at least 2 complete 360° turns. The lockwire ends should be trimmed and bent out of the way of any part interference.
Keep yoke bars in neutral while assembling.

step1.para: Assemble the 1st & reverse shift yoke assembly ( Figure 122):

step2.para: Install the plunger in the 1st & reverse shift yoke bore, plunger shank to the outside.
Install the spring into the bore over the plunger shank.
Position the washer over the plunger shank.

step1.para: Assemble the 3rd speed block assembly ( Figure 123):

step2.para: Install the plunger in the 3rd shift block bore, plunger shank to the outside.
Install the spring into the bore over the plunger shank.
Install the plug and tighten to compress the spring.
After plug bottoms out, back the plug out 1 to 1 1/2 turns.
Complete the block assembly process by staking the plug through the small hole in block.

step1.para: With the housing rear to the right, lay the assembly on a flat surface ( Figure 124).
Install the select tube in the middle boss with key in the key slot ( Figure 124).
As the select tube passes through the first boss, install the shift select block ( Figure 124).
From the right, install the select interlock bar ( Figure 125).
Install the range interlock bar, chamfered end in, notched side down ( Figure 126).
At the middle yoke bar front end, install the washer, plain nut, and jam nut ( Figure 127).
Install the interlock pin, centered between bosses ( Figure 127).
While installing the top yoke bar, position the shift yoke assembly and block assembly. The block assembly aligns with shift select block ear ( Figure 128).

figure.caption: Figure 128. Top Yoke - Block Assembly Aligns With Shift Select Block Ear

step1.para: Install the setscrews and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque. Lockwire securely.
While installing the bottom yoke bar, position the shift yoke. The block assembly aligns with shift select block ear ( Figure 129).

figure.caption: Figure 129. Bottom Yoke - Block Assembly Aligns With Shift Select Block Ear

step1.para: Install the setscrew and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) of torque. Lockwire securely.
